title: Automate sales follow-ups with GPT-4o-mini, HubSpot, Slack, Teams & Telegram
description:
## How it works

This workflow automatically generates personalized follow-up messages for leads or customers after key interactions (e.g., demos, sales calls). It enriches contact details from HubSpot (or optionally Monday.com), uses AI to draft a professional follow-up email, and distributes it across multiple communication channels (Slack, Telegram, Teams) as reminders for the sales team.

## Step-by-step
**1. Trigger & Input**

- Schedule Trigger ‚Äì Runs automatically at a defined interval (e.g., daily).

- Set Sample Data ‚Äì Captures the contact‚Äôs name, email, and context from the last interaction (e.g., ‚Äúhad a product demo yesterday and showed strong interest‚Äù).

**2. Contact Enrichment**

- HubSpot Contact Lookup ‚Äì Searches HubSpot CRM by email to confirm or enrich contact details.

- Monday.com Contact Fetch (Optional) ‚Äì Can pull additional CRM details if enabled.

**3. AI Message Generation**

- AI Language Model (OpenAI) ‚Äì Provides the underlying engine for message creation.

- Generate Follow-Up Message ‚Äì Drafts a short, professional, and friendly follow-up email:

- References previous interaction context.

- Suggests clear next steps (call, resources, etc.).

- Ends with a standardized signature block for consistency.

**4. Multi-Channel Communication**

- Slack Reminder ‚Äì Posts the generated message as a reminder in the sales team‚Äôs Slack channel.

- Telegram Reminder ‚Äì Sends the follow-up draft to a Telegram chat.

- Teams Reminder ‚Äì Shares the same message in a Microsoft Teams channel.

## Benefits

- Personalized Outreach at Scale ‚Äì AI ensures each follow-up feels tailored and professional.

- Context-Aware Messaging ‚Äì Pulls in CRM details and past interactions for relevance.

- Cross-Platform Delivery ‚Äì Distributes reminders via Slack, Teams, and Telegram so no follow-up is missed.

- Time-Saving for Sales Teams ‚Äì Eliminates manual drafting of repetitive follow-up emails.

- Consistent Branding ‚Äì Ensures every message includes a unified signature block.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
